title: Login Server Issues
body:
We're aware that our login servers are currently having a few difficulties with letting our players get logged into the client. We're working on getting those servers back up so that you'll be able to sign on once again, but if you're currently logged in you should not be affected. 

As a method of loss prevention, **Ranked Play has been disabled**. If someone is disconnected from a ranked game while the login servers are down, they would not be able to get logged in and back in the match.

Be sure to check out [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates, and we'll be sure to post updates here as well!

> **EDIT:** As of 4:36 PST the login issues should be resolved!
